item.content:encoded:
Mmh I know… it’s been over a decade ago when this must-use plugin snippet was first launched… since then, I’ve been religiously copying it to all my websites running WP over nginx.

After all these years, I wonder if the underlying issue has been ‘fixed’ by Automattic at the WP core level? In other words â€” is this ‘pretty permalinks’ workaround for nginx still necessary, on contemporary (uh, 2021) versions of WP/nginx?

I’m just curious â€” leaving the must-use plugin around seems not to have any harmful effect, so, unless told otherwise, I’ll keep it there…
